name.en: What Are the Types of Varicose Veins?
name.de: Welche Arten von Krampfadern gibt es?

description.tr: Varis türleri: telanjiektazi, retiküler varis, trunkal varis, perforan ven yetmezliği. Doç. Dr. Orhan Veli Doğan vasküler ve endovasküler tedavi (EVAR, TEVAR, periferik anjiyoplasti) ile değerlendirir.
description.en: Types of varicose veins: telangiectasia, reticular, truncal, perforator insufficiency. Evaluated with vascular and endovascular treatment.
description.de: Arten von Krampfadern: Teleangiektasie, retikuläre, Stammvarizen, Perforansinsuffizienz.
description.ru: Типы варикоза: телеангиэктазия, ретикулярный, стволовой, недостаточность перфорантов.

keyword.tr: varis türleri, telanjiektazi, retiküler varis, trunkal varis, perforan ven, Doç. Dr. Orhan Veli Doğan
keyword.en: varicose vein types, telangiectasia, reticular varicose, truncal, perforator vein

spot.tr: Telanjiektazi, retiküler, trunkal ve perforan ven varis türleri. Vasküler cerrahi uzmanı değerlendirmesi.
spot.en: Telangiectasia, reticular, truncal and perforator vein types. Vascular surgery assessment.
spot.de: Teleangiektasie, retikuläre, Stamm- und Perforansvenen. Vaskuläre Beurteilung.
